channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion Accessories
channel.desc: Complete your look with our selection of marvellous fashion accessories. We've collected together our favourite footwear, bags and fabulous finishing touches from right across our brands.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique Jewellery
channel.desc: Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: L'Occitane
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: L'Occitane
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Lock & Lock Storage Solutions
channel.desc: Keep your food fresher for longer with innovative storage solutions from Lock & Lock. You can use them in the microwave and even in the freezer, making them the perfect addition to your kitchen.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: L'Occitane
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.
